channel.title: KshitijAgrawal - AI Researcher
channel.description: Recent content on KshitijAgrawal - AI Researcher

item.title: Consulting
item.description: Having seen multiple 0-to-1 journies, I enjoy the challenge of building and scaling new technological systems. I have worked across marketplaces, chipmakers, military-tech, gaming/adtech, generative apps, hrms systems and many more. Here is how I like to select projects High-Value Projects: I seek projects that leverage my expertise and create significant impact for founders, and in return, equitable compensation. Exploring new industries: I intend to pursue opportunities that explore different avenues and industries while leveraging my knowledge across systems.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I have 10 years of experience building large scale computer vision and nlp systems in innovation teams across small to large enterprise and startups. I have deployed large scale LLM/CV solutions, for document processing and image generation (at Swiggy), autonomous driving (at Intel) and night vision systems (deployed on Arjun Tank4). I have published research at AI conferences - NeurIPs, AAAI and ICCV. Research Interests Embeddings for multi-task representation Search systems Named entity recognition Natural information extraction Semantic Segmentation Object detection Few shot learning Multimodal systems Here are a list of my publications

item.title: Welcome to my tech blog
item.description: Here are a few of my areas of interest, general research and things I find interesting. Areas of Interest - Large Lanuage Models Sequence classification, topic / doc classification, embeddings, vector search Computer Vision Semantic Segmentation, Object detection , pose detection Classical image processing Image quality assessment Face Recognition / Face Detection Few Shot Learning , Continual Learning , Metric Learning Model Deployment & Serving optimization Here are a list of my publications
